constituent: difficult, scarecrow, flowers, mouth, husband, turkey
koohiiStory1: Learning Kanji is difficult for Turkeys.
koohiiStory2: It is difficult for a scarecrow to scare a turkey or else they would´ve been called scareturkeys.
kunYomi: かた.い、-がた.い、むずか.しい、むづか.しい、むつか.しい、-にく.い
readingExamples: 難い (かた.い), 難しい (むずか.しい)

有難う(ありがとう): Thank you

避難(ひなん): taking refuge, finding shelter
非難(ひなん): blame, attack, criticism
無難(ぶなん): safety, security

困難(こんなん): difficulty, distress
災難(さいなん): calamity, misfortune
